TEXT.S: = Narowan = Gaga mniq Hwareyseyn Jweysweysyang ka alang Narowan. 814 sapah ka kneegu na sapah, 2,080 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnpusu seejiq o mangal 22% niqan 457 hiyi sp, rahuq na uxay tnpusu seejiq o mangal 78% niqan 1,623 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Amis 17%, Sakizaya 1%, Truku 1%, Tayal 1%, Bunun 1%.
